title: The Studio workshop
creator_credit: George Lewin and Triton Manufacturing and Design Company
brief_description: This comprehensive two cassette programme provides the home improver with a step by step guide how to plan and build a studio workshop. Hosted by George Lewin, inventor of the Triton Workcentre, the video provides dozens of labour saving tips, and makes effective use of computer generated graphics to clarify techniques and principles. Tape one covers site preparation, laying foundations, bricklaying, wall and roof framing. Tape two covers wall and roof cladding, windows and doors, as well as fitout.
